mention.text: caribbean rights , which groups seven human rights organisations in the region , on thursday joined amnesty international in a campaign denouncing what was described as the `` inhumane and violent conditions '' perpetrated by the peruvian armed forces
the ultimate responsibility of the government to uphold law even in the face of violent opposition
a cable to president alan garcia
a recent report published by amnesty
methods adopted by the peruvian government in combating violent opposition groups like the `` shining path '' guerrillas
